citations.narrative:
Several enclosures housing, 17 adult dogs and 10 puppies, have stainless steel water receptacles use to water the dogs.
These receptacles did not have any water during the inspection. Without continuous potable water availability for the dogs
this can potentially affect their health and well-being.
To ensure the health and well-being of the dogs is maintained, all dogs must have continuous water.
To be corrected by, 13-April-2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with .the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.10(a) 
   
Watering 
Several enclosures housing, 17 adult dogs and 10 puppies, have stainless steel water receptacles use to water the dogs.  
These receptacles did not have any water during the inspection. Without continuous potable water availability for the dogs 
this can potentially affect their health and well-being. 
 
To ensure the health and well-being of the dogs is maintained, all dogs must have continuous water. 
 
To be corrected by, 13-April-2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with .the facility representative. 
 
 n
